means: 使动作( actuate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He was actuated entirely by malice.
The timer must have been actuated by radio control.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个定时器肯定是无线电操纵开动的.

sentence.Network_en: The pump is actuated by a belt driven by an electric motor.
sentence.Network_cn: 这台抽水机由电动机皮带驱动.

PerfectNetExp.abs: actuated torque valve 动作转矩阀actuated 动作的actuating arm 驱动杆
actuate 促动actuated 开动的actuating arm 力臂
a water heater's temperature pressure relief valve must be piped to the nearest drain in order to avoid damage in the event the valve is actuated .热水器的降温减压安全阀必须用管道连接到最近的排水口，以避免万一阀门启动所造成的破坏。
Semi - actuated signal., 半触动号志.

list.abs: 电梯专业英语 - 豆丁网 ... actuating magnet 操作磁铁 actuation time 动作时间 actuator bracket 调节器支架.
机械专业英语词汇_百度文库 ... 插齿 gear shaping 伺服电机 actuating motor 铣床 milling machine.
DC-002 ... 额定负荷 Rated load 动作力 Actuating Force 接触电阻 Contact Resistance.
自动化专业英语词汇表 ... 旋塞阀 plug valve 气动执行机构 pneumatic actuator 点位控制 point-to-point control.

entry.def: If a person is actuated by an emotion, that emotion makes them act in a certain way. If something actuates a device, the device starts working.

example.ex: The flow of current actuates the signal.

auth_sentence.content: The new paradigm is big, heavy, substantial, with lots of computer-actuated muscle and ultrafast.
auth_sentence.res_content: The new paradigm is big, heavy, substantial, with lots of computer-actuated muscle and ultrafast.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The new paradigm is big, heavy, substantial, with lots of computer-actuated muscle and ultrafast.

auth_sentence.content: The new paradigm is big, heavy, substantial, with lots of computer-actuated muscle and driver assistance, and ultrafast.
